name: Tea & Herbal Infusions Europe
goal: Tea & Herbal Infusions Europe (THIE) is the European association representing the interests of producers and traders of tea (Camellia sinensis) and herbal infusions as well as extracts thereof in the EU. The main objectives of the association are to establish a common European policy with regard to tea and herbal infusions and to make contact with EU-officials and representatives of other organisations and to collaborate constructively with them in any matter related to the tea and herbal infusions trade and industry.
interests: Agriculture, Consumers, Customs, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Food information to consumers;

Quality assurance and food safety;

Pesticide regulations and contaminants regulation;

Activities of the Standing Committee on Phytopharmaceuticals;

Activities of the Standing Committee on Novel Food and Toxicological Safety of the Food Chain;

Novel Food Catalogue;

Regulatory Fitness and Performance Programme (REFIT);

EU and Codex Alimentarius CCPR;

International trade and cooperation with tea growing countries;

Nutrition
